edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.framework.gui.panels
Interface GuiPanel

All Known Implementing Classes:
AddEditPanel, ConfigurationFilesPanel, ControlToolBarPanel, FrameworkTaskPanel, GlobalWorkspaceTablePanel, GuiPanelImpl, LoggingPanel, NodeStructurePanel, NodeStructureTable, TaskQueuePanel
public interface GuiPanel

A GUI Panel which can be displayed in the FrameworkGui

Author:
Javier Snaider
